name: Mansion Courtyard — Cuisinier's Abode
description: A tower in Sumeru Mansion: Meditative Retreat. A delicate umbrella stands at the center of the platform, offering a limited amount of cover — just enough for a small stove or campfire.\nCooking certain cuisines in the rainforest necessitates controlling for environmental moisture and keeping ingredients as dry as possible. Heading higher up to avoid the moist, low ground and the dew drops falling from the leaves is probably a good idea...
